Create a personalized cyber security training program for employees of the multinational company. This could include interactive modules that simulate real-world scenarios to help employees identify potential threats and learn how to respond effectively.
Develop a system for monitoring and analyzing network traffic in real-time, using machine learning algorithms to detect and prevent suspicious activity before it can cause damage.
Implement a two-factor authentication system for all company accounts, requiring users to provide both a password and a unique code sent to their mobile device or email address.
Establish a team of cybersecurity experts who are available 24/7 to respond to any incidents and provide guidance on how to mitigate the impact of an attack.

Create a comprehensive incident response plan that outlines the steps the company should take in the event of a cyber attack, including procedures for containing the damage, notifying relevant parties, and conducting a post-incident review to identify areas for improvement.
